title: (x) sans used in Bang & Olufsen website submenu - Frutiger {Pieter}
content:
Need some help â€”

So, actually I am looking for the font used in their Bang & Olufsen submenu of the main site.

But, for scrutiny sake, Ive attached their logo where it is also used (I believe).

What is this font??

Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119060212/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_17.jpg) | 6.7 KB |
| [sample2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119060212/http:/typophile.com/files/sample2.jpg) | 9.28 KB |
author: wnf

comments.content:
I saw that...  
But, I felt that that post concentrated more on the B&O part, not on the untreated font.
It looks like Frutiger to me.

sample2.jpg (submenu of the main site) - Frutiger LT  
 [http://www.linotype.com/469/frutiger-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119060212/http:/www.linotype.com/469/frutiger-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/469/frutiger-family.html")

[http://www.linotype.com/1595/adslifestyle.html?PHPSESSID=94e239fb324b0a4...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119060212/http:/www.linotype.com/1595/adslifestyle.html?PHPSESSID=94e239fb324b0a4896a914bf91671d8e#13718 "http://www.linotype.com/1595/adslifestyle.html?PHPSESSID=94e239fb324b0a4896a914bf91671d8e#13718")

suntory

Big thanks.... one more question.

When they use upper and lower case together for subheads, is that still Frutiger?

wownflutter

\>\>When they use upper and lower case together for subheads

Could you make a screenshot of lowercase letters you asking about?

Thanks... here you go.

Is it the same Frutiger?
